questions.text: Do you have any allergies to CBD/THC?
questions.disqualifyMessage: For your safety, we cannot prescribe CBD if you have an allergy to CBD/THC.

questions.text: Are you currently taking CBD/THC in other forms?
Do you have any history or current Liver Disease?
questions.disqualifyMessage: CBD is not recommended for patients with liver disease.
For safety reasons, CBD is not recommended during pregnancy or breastfeeding.

questions.text: Do you currently have an infection (cold, viral, bacterial or other)?
questions.disqualifyMessage: Please wait until your infection has resolved before starting CBD treatment.

questions.text: Are you currently taking any of the following medications: Warfarin, Dabigatran (Pradaxa), Antibiotics, Anti-virals, Deuruxolitinib (Leqselvi), Isocarboxazid (Marplan)?
questions.disqualifyMessage: These medications may interact dangerously with CBD. Please discuss alternatives with your healthcare provider.

questions.text: Do you have history of or currently have seizures requiring medication?

Are you currently taking any of the following: Benzodiazepines (alprazolam, clobazam), Immune system modulators (Tacrolimus, rifampin, kinase inhibitors, hydroxychloroquine), CNS Depressants (Narcotics, trazodone, gabapentin, oxybates, pregabalin), Neurotransmitter modulators (Anti-depressants, Carbidopa/Levodopa, Anti-inflammatories, Anti-histamines)?
